channel.title: Change from starting as a girl to a boy
channel.description: when some1 makes a new account they are a girl, i want the ability to change that to a boy and change the hairstyles and etc. I may sound like a dumbass, but ive tried and nothing has worked, please tell me how please.

item.title: Change from starting as a girl to a boy
item.dc:creator: @rocketscience rocketscience
item.source: Change from starting as a girl to a boy

item.title: Change from starting as a girl to a boy
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Open Player.Java

Search

unique

Youâ€™ll see Giving your player a unique look

Go down a little until you see

[code]/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

	pHead=45;
	pTorso=56;
	pArms=61;
	pHands=67;
	pLegs=70;
	pFeet=79;
	pBeard=14;[/code]

This is female:

45-55: fem head 56-60: fem torso 61-66: fem arms 67-69: fem hands 70-78: fem legs 79-81: fem feet */

Any number between there

Male is

0-9: male head 10-17: male beard 18-25: male torso 26-32: male arms 33-35: male hands 36-41: male legs 42-44: male feet

Just Put Any number in the male Section in:

pHead=45; pTorso=56; pArms=61; pHands=67; pLegs=70; pFeet=79; pBeard=14;

And save and compile, there he should be a guy.

Read full topic
